long_description: The comfortable, attractive Merrell Lily Dress transitions nicely from a beach cover up to a casual dress for cocktails on the lanai. Opti-Wick(TM) fabric transfers moisture away from your skin and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Spandex adds all-around comfort and shape retention for travel-friendly, easy care. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Built-in shelf bra provides light suppport; sporty crossover back and hem detailing add style. Closeout.
short_description: The comfortable, attractive Merrell Lily Dress transitions nicely from a beach cover up to a casual dress for cocktails on the lanai.
